thread.title: Kriszta T贸th

author: Kriszta T贸th
title: Kriszta T贸th
text:
The price was way cheaper (almost half) than all the other rental companies' in Tenerife. There was no hassle at all, we didn't even have to pay a deposit for the car. The baby seats were piled up in the office, so anyone who wanted one just had to pick up what she needed...
For this, you are likely to get an older car (ours was of 2002), and in the last days our car's cluth started to function wrongly, and it gave a quite scary sound. Luckily we managed to arrive safely back to the airport, but we gave a half extra day for that journey, in case anything happens on the way...
